Interface StockReadWriter

All Superinterfaces:
StockReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
F_StockRW, StockRW
public interface StockReadWriter extends StockReader
Interface for read/write access to the stock list.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Mike Smith University of Brighton

  • Method Details

    • buyStock

      boolean buyStock(String pNum, int amount) throws StockException
      Customer buys stock, stock level is thus decremented by amount bought.
      Parameters:
      pNum - Product number
      amount - Quantity of product
      Returns:
      StockNumber, Description, Price, Quantity
      Throws:
      StockException - if issue

    • addStock

      void addStock(String pNum, int amount) throws StockException
      Adds stock (Restocks) to store.
      Parameters:
      pNum - Product number
      amount - Quantity of product
      Throws:
      StockException - if issue

    • modifyStock

      void modifyStock(Product detail) throws StockException
      Modifies Stock details for a given product number. Information modified: Description, Price
      Parameters:
      detail - Replace with this version of product
      Throws:
      StockException - if issue

    • setStock

      void setStock(String productNum, int quantity) throws StockException
      Sets the stock quantity for a product.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number
      quantity - The new stock quantity
      Throws:
      StockException - if an error occurs while setting the stock

    • getProducts

      List<Product> getProducts() throws StockException
      Retrieves the list of all products.
      Returns:
      List of products
      Throws:
      StockException - if an error occurs while retrieving the products

    • addProduct

      void addProduct(Product product) throws StockException
      Adds a new product to the stock.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to add
      Throws:
      StockException - if an error occurs while adding the product

    • updateProductImage

      void updateProductImage(String productNum, String imagePath) throws StockException
      Updates the image path for a product
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number
      imagePath - The new image path
      Throws:
      StockException - if an error occurs

    • deleteProduct

      void deleteProduct(String productNum) throws StockException
      Deletes a product from the stock.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number
      Throws:
      StockException - if an error occurs while deleting the product
